sys_hub_flow.name: TRIGGER_OnUpdate_Computers_From_Armis

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Once we're done processing the record, we don't need it anymore.

sys_variable_value.value: we have a matching Armis Device Table record

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Armis identifies devices by MAC only, so it can be used as a primary key to check whether we already have a device with the same MAC.

sys_hub_sub_flow_instance.comment: First, check to make sure we're not in a cooldown period. The cooldown period is invoked because when this integration sends information up to Armis, Armis will send an update back down to ServiceNow.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Armis identifies devices by MAC only, so it can be used as a primary key to check whether we already have a device with the same MAC.
Once we're done processing the record, we don't need it anymore.
